item.title: How to Contribute to Ruby on Rails
item.description: Not sure how to start contributing to Ruby on Rails? Are you looking for an opportunity to get experience? Make meaningful connections with the community? Learn the best practices on how to maintain a large codebase? Do you have a great idea that can benefit the Rails community? By the end of this post, you’ll learn 5 ways to become a new Rails contributor. 5 ways to contribute to Ruby on Rails as a beginner Click here to get the PDF ðŸ‘ˆ
